column1: '''The City of the Gods''' is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and published in Spring [[1923]] in the magazine [[The Microcosm
column3: Vol.8 No.1]]. It was published earlier on [[30 April]] [[1915]] as ''[[KÃ´r]]'' with the subtitle "In a City Lost and Dead" and can also be read within ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]''.<ref>{{LT1|IIIn}}
